page.title: 20SHOPS IN OUR AREA
page.content: We have many shops in our area, especially in Corstorphine. There are also little shopping areas in the housing schemes, like at Parkgrove Street. These local shops are quite expensive; there is a newsagent/post office, butcher, baker, ironmonger, grocer, chemist and shoe repairer. Some of the children from our school go to these shops in the middle of the day to buy their lunch and eat it outside. There are houses above the shops, and houses round them. At East Craigs there is a very large super- market called {SAFEWAYS.}It is very popular, opens every day including Sunday, and has a large car park. We surveyed local parents and here is our result:10% never use it; 70% use a car when shopping, and 50% shop there once or more a week. Most people liked the convenience, prices and selection.
